meanings.definition: Zerks (noun): A type of lubrication fitting used in mechanical systems.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic attached the zerks to the machine to ensure proper lubrication.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the zerks regularly to prevent any mechanical issues.
meanings.sent3: The zerks decided to throw a party in the machine shop to celebrate their important role.
meanings.sent4: The zerks were like tiny heroes, keeping the gears moving smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The shiny zerks gleamed in the dimly lit workshop, ready to do their job.

meanings.definition: Zerks (verb): To install or maintain zerks on a machine for lubrication purposes.
meanings.sent1: The technician zerks the equipment to ensure it runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Remember to zerk the machinery after every 100 hours of operation.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to zerk the entire factory as a team-building exercise.
meanings.sent4: She zerked the machine with precision, knowing the importance of proper lubrication.
meanings.sent5: As the expert zerked the gears, the whole system hummed with efficiency.
